alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 2:44PM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches with locally up to 4 inches in the highest peaks of the southern Greens. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 7 inches or more possible. * WHERE...Bennington and Windham Counties in southern Vermont. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday afternoon through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous into this evening and difficult later Sunday into Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers will continue this afternoon before gradually tapering off tonight. Greatest amounts will be at elevations above 1000 feet. The actual track of a winter storm Sunday into Monday remains uncertain and this will impact how much snow occurs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
